content: make these beautiful crochet gingerbread heart ornaments to decorate your home and christmas tree or give them to friends and family free versions of these patterns are available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-gingerbread-heart-ornaments/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format video tutorial https //youtu be/jh-tdo2fkl8 si=l6lxypdaobm8sqfr product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external websites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
